content: this is a listing for crochet baby bonnet - back to basics you can find more patterns here https //www ravelry com/designers/croby-patterns > buy 3 patterns or more and get 20% off > on the entire purchase no coupon is > needed happy crocheting **sizes ** baby 0 - 6 months baby 6 - 12 months **materials** yarn aran weight yarn - drops paris crochet hook 5 0 mm you will also need 2 stitch markers a tapestry needle scissors **stitches ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet ******************************************************* **number of pages in pdf ** 2 **in the pdf ** written instructions step-by-step photo tutorial and video tutorial youtube **language** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy ******************************************************* **please note ** you can find this pattern with ads on my blog crobypatterns com and video tutorial on my youtube channel however in the smallest size only
